00035 /*
00036  When processing split archives, this value is passes as the argument to the CZipCallback::Callback method
00037  to notify that the current volume is the last one.
00038 */
00039 #define ZIP_SPLIT_LAST_VOLUME (ZIP_SIZE_TYPE)(-1)

00151 struct ZIP_API CZipActionCallback : public CZipCallback
00152 {  
00153  friend class CZipArchive;
00154  friend class CZipCentralDir;
00155 
00166  enum CallbackType
00167  {
00172   cbNothing  = 0x0000,
00173 
00178   cbAdd   = 0x0001,
00179 
00186   cbAddTmp  = 0x0002,
00187 
00195   cbAddStore  = 0x0004, 
00196 
00201   cbExtract  = 0x0008,
00202 
00209   cbDeleteCnt  = 0x0010,
00210 
00216   cbDelete  = 0x0020,
00217 
00222   cbTest   = 0x0040,
00223 
00230   cbSave   = 0x0080,
00231 
00236   cbGet   = 0x0100,
00237 
00243   cbRename  = 0x0200,
00244 
00250   cbMoveData  = 0x0400,
00251 
00258   cbCalculateForMulti= 0x0800,
00259   
00267   cbMultiAdd  = 0x1000 | cbAdd,
00268 
00269   
00276   cbEncryptPrepare= 0x2000,
00277 
00284   cbEncryptMoveData= 0x4000,
00285 
00292   cbEncrypt  = 0x8000,
00293 
00294 
00303   cbMultiEncrypt = 0x10000 | cbEncryptMoveData | cbEncrypt,
00304 
00310   cbNextValue  = 0x20000,
00311   
00317   cbSubActions = cbAddTmp | cbAddStore | cbDeleteCnt | cbMoveData | cbCalculateForMulti | cbEncryptPrepare | cbEncryptMoveData,
00318 
00323   cbActions  = cbAdd | cbExtract | cbDelete | cbTest | cbSave | cbGet | cbRename | cbEncrypt,
00324 
00330   cbMultiActions = cbMultiAdd | cbMultiEncrypt,
00331 
00336   cbAll   = cbActions | cbSubActions | cbMultiActions
00337  };

00348  struct ZIP_API CMultiActionsInfo
00349  {
00350   friend struct CZipActionCallback;
00351 
00352   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uTotalBytesToProcess; 
00353   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uTotalFilesToProcess; 
00354   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uBytesProcessed;  
00355   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uFilesProcessed;  
00356 
00362   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE LeftFilesToProcess() const {return m_uTotalFilesToProcess - m_uFilesProcessed;}
00363 
00369   ZIP_SIZE_TYPE LeftBytesToProcess() const {return m_uTotalBytesToProcess - m_uBytesProcessed;}  
00370  private:
00371   void Init(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalItemsToProcess, ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalBytesToProcess, int iReactType)
00372   {
00373    m_uTotalFilesToProcess = uTotalItemsToProcess;
00374    m_uTotalBytesToProcess = uTotalBytesToProcess;
00375    m_uBytesProcessed = m_uFilesProcessed = 0;
00376    m_iReactType = iReactType;
00377    m_bActive = false;
00378   }
00379   void OnCallbackInit(int iType)
00380   {
00381    // this assumes, that the callback type will stay unchanged 
00382    // between Init() and CallbackEnd()
00383    m_bActive = iType == m_iReactType;
00384   }
00385 
00386   void OnCallCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress)
00387   {
00388    if (m_bActive)
00389     m_uBytesProcessed += uProgress;
00390   }
00391   bool OnNextFile()
00392   {
00393    if (m_bActive)
00394    {
00395     m_uFilesProcessed++;
00396     return true;
00397    }
00398    else
00399     return false;
00400   }
00401   bool m_bActive;  
00402   int m_iReactType;
00403  };
00404 
00405  CZipActionCallback()
00406  {  
00407   m_uTotalToProcess = 0;
00408   m_uProcessed = 0;
00409   m_pMultiActionsInfo = NULL;
00410  }
00411 
00433  virtual void MultiActionsInit(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalFilesToProcess, ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalBytesToProcess, int iReactType)
00434  {
00435   InitMultiActionsInfo();
00436   m_pMultiActionsInfo->Init(uTotalFilesToProcess, uTotalBytesToProcess, iReactType);
00437  }
00438  
00450  virtual void Init(LPCTSTR lpszFileInZip = NULL, LPCTSTR lpszExternalFile = NULL) 
00451  {
00452   m_szFileInZip = lpszFileInZip;
00453   m_szExternalFile = lpszExternalFile;
00454   m_uTotalToProcess = 0;  // not yet known
00455   m_uProcessed = 0; // nothing yet done
00456   CacheStepSize();  
00457   ResetProgressStage();
00458   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo)
00459    // the type is known now
00460    m_pMultiActionsInfo->OnCallbackInit(m_iType);
00461  }
00462 
00469  virtual void SetTotal(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uTotalToDo)
00470  {
00471   m_uTotalToProcess = uTotalToDo;
00472 //   m_uProcessed = 0; // already done in CZipCallbackProvider::Get
00473  } 
00474 
00488  virtual bool MultiActionsNext()
00489  {
00490   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo && m_pMultiActionsInfo->OnNextFile())
00491    return Callback(0);
00492   else
00493    return true;
00494  }
00495 
00501  virtual void CallbackEnd()
00502  {
00503   //ASSERT(m_uProcessed == m_uTotalToProcess);  
00504  };
00505  
00516  virtual void MultiActionsEnd()
00517  {
00518   ReleaseMultiActionsInfo();
00519  }
00520 
00527  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE LeftToProcess() const {return m_uTotalToProcess - m_uProcessed;}
00528 
00541  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uTotalToProcess;    
00542  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uProcessed; 
00543  CZipString m_szFileInZip;  
00544 
00549  int m_iType;
00550 
00561  CMultiActionsInfo* GetMultiActionsInfo()
00562  {
00563   return m_pMultiActionsInfo;
00564  }
00565 
00572  void SetReactType(int iType)
00573  {
00574   m_pMultiActionsInfo->m_iReactType = iType;
00575  }
00576 
00595  virtual int GetStepSize()
00596  {
00597   return m_iType == cbSave || m_iType == cbDeleteCnt || m_iType == cbCalculateForMulti || m_iType == cbEncryptPrepare ? 256 : 1;
00598  }
00599 
00600  ~CZipActionCallback()
00601  {
00602   ReleaseMultiActionsInfo();
00603  }
00604 
00615  bool RequestCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress = 1)
00616  {
00617   if (!uProgress)
00618    return true;
00619   if (m_iCachedStepSize == 1)
00620    return CallCallback(uProgress);
00621   else
00622   {
00623    m_uAccumulatedProgress += uProgress;  
00624    if (m_iCurrentStep >= m_iCachedStepSize)
00625    {
00626     bool ret = CallCallback(m_uAccumulatedProgress);
00627     ResetProgressStage();
00628     return ret;
00629    }
00630    else
00631    {
00632     m_iCurrentStep++;
00633     return true;
00634    }
00635   }
00636  }
00637 
00651  bool RequestLastCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress = 0)
00652  {
00653   bool ret;
00654   if (m_uAccumulatedProgress == 0 && uProgress == 0)
00655    ret = true;
00656   else
00657    ret = CallCallback(m_uAccumulatedProgress + uProgress);
00658   ResetProgressStage();
00659   return ret;
00660  }
00661 
00662 protected: 
00674  virtual bool CallCallback(ZIP_SIZE_TYPE uProgress)
00675  {
00676   m_uProcessed += uProgress;
00677   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo)
00678    m_pMultiActionsInfo->OnCallCallback(uProgress);
00679   return Callback(uProgress);
00680  }
00681 
00685  void CacheStepSize()
00686  {
00687   m_iCachedStepSize = GetStepSize();
00688   if (m_iCachedStepSize == 0)
00689    m_iCachedStepSize = 1;
00690  }
00691 
00699  void ResetProgressStage()
00700  {
00701   m_iCurrentStep = 1;
00702   m_uAccumulatedProgress = 0;
00703  }
00704 private:
00705  CMultiActionsInfo* m_pMultiActionsInfo;
00706  void InitMultiActionsInfo()
00707  {
00708   ReleaseMultiActionsInfo();
00709   m_pMultiActionsInfo = new CMultiActionsInfo();
00710  }
00711  void ReleaseMultiActionsInfo()
00712  {
00713   if (m_pMultiActionsInfo != NULL)
00714   {
00715    delete m_pMultiActionsInfo;
00716    m_pMultiActionsInfo = NULL;
00717   }
00718  }
00719 
00720  int m_iCachedStepSize; 
00721  int m_iCurrentStep;
00722  ZIP_SIZE_TYPE m_uAccumulatedProgress;
00723 };
